Text: Victorias Secret Shipment ConfirmationDear Kimberly Thank you for shopping Victorias Secret The items below for backorder number and client number shipped on via United States Postal Service Ctlg Item DescriptionColor Size Ordered Price Status Ship Date FE Bra Top squareneck S InStock lavender If there are any remaining backordered items on your original order you will receive an email shipping confirmation for those items as they are shipped To check the status of an order or view your order history click on the link below orderstatuscustNumordNum Please note Any special offer deduction is recalculated when merchandise is returned or exchanged If you have any questions please reply to this message or email us at ictoriasSecretcom To help us better assist you please include both your client and order numbers in the text of your message You may also contact us by phone at outside the US and Canada dial or by fax at Si necesita ayuda en espanol llame al If you need assistance in Japanese please call Thank you for shopping Victorias Secret Victorias Secret Client Services To make your shopping experience even more luxurious we can now send you information about the status of your orders via email We hope that you enjoy the convenience of this new service If however you wish to not receive orderrelated email from us please click here opremovalcfmemailKIM NRONCOM If you are unable to access the above link from this email please copy and then paste the URL into the address field of your browser
